Uses of Interface
nzilbb.ag.serialize.GraphSerializer

  • Packages that use GraphSerializer 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.ag
    Implementation of an Annotation Graph API for linguistic annotations.
    nzilbb.ag.serialize
    Contains interfaces that are required to convert too/from specific file formats.
    nzilbb.ag.serialize.json
    Annotation Graph serializer/deserializer for JSON.

    • Uses of GraphSerializer in nzilbb.ag

      Methods in nzilbb.ag that return GraphSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GraphSerializer GraphStoreQuery.serializerForFilesSuffix​(String suffix)
      Gets the serializer for the given file suffix (extension).
      GraphSerializer GraphStoreQuery.serializerForMimeType​(String mimeType)
      Gets the serializer for the given MIME type.
      Methods in nzilbb.ag with parameters of type GraphSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void GraphStoreAdministration.deregisterSerializer​(GraphSerializer serializer)
      De-registers a transcript serializer.
      void GraphStoreAdministration.registerSerializer​(GraphSerializer serializer)
      Registers a transcript serializer.

    • Uses of GraphSerializer in nzilbb.ag.serialize

      Subinterfaces of GraphSerializer in nzilbb.ag.serialize 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ISerializer
      Deprecated.
      Use GraphSerializer instead.
